name: jsx-alone
description: monorepo containing suitecommerce types for different areas.

scripts.build: npx yamat run npm run build
scripts.clean: npx yamat run npm run clean
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm test
scripts.yamat-link: npx yamat link && npm run cleanPackageLock && npx yamat run npm i && npm run build
scripts.yamat-unlink-pack: npx yamat unlink --version pack && npm run cleanPackageLock && npx yamat run npm i && npm run build
scripts.yamat-patch-publish: npx yamat run npm version patch && npm run cleanPackageLock && npx yamat run npm i&& npx yamat unlink && npx yamat --break-on-error no run npm publish

author: Sebastian Gurin
